DOC.brief_summary: This study observational cohort study utilize administrative claim data 100 patient randomly select take Metanx® meeting inclusion exclusion criterion 400 propensity score match patient meet criterion serve control cohort analysis . This data include medical , pharmacy claim HealthCore Integrated Research Database claim submit time period 01/01/2002 06/30/2007 .
DOC.brief_title: Administrative Claims Analysis Metanx® Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.detailed_description: The control patient match ratio 4:1 Metanx® patient . Covariates use select propensity match patient include : age ; gender ; health plan type region ; DCI score ; presence/absence nephropathy ; ischemic heart disease ; cerebrovascular disease ; neoplasm ; insulin use ; all-cause health plan cost 6-mont pre-index period . Claims information patient select study follow longitudinally end data availability . This data stream use determine treatment pattern Metanx® , healthcare resource utilization , cost .
DOC.criteria: Patients must pharmacy claim > 120 continuous day Metanx® . This define least 90day supply dispense within first 120 day postindex . The first pharmacy claim Metanx® index date . Patients must diagnosis diabetes prior include index date . Patients must diagnosis peripheral neurological peripheral circulation disorder . Patients must diagnosis low limb ulcer . Patients exclude < 18 month eligibility define minimum 6 month pre 12 month postindex eligibility . Patients exclude take Lmethylfolate containing product ( Deplin® , Cerefolin® , Cerefolin NAC® , Neevo® ) prescription folic acid combination product > 1mg folic acid .
